trans-unit.source: Creates a control that displays an image on a page.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kontroll som viser et bilde på en side.

trans-unit.source: When a hot spot region defined within the ImageMap control is clicked, the control either generates a postback to the server or navigates to a specified URL.
trans-unit.target: Når et e-område er definert i kontrollen ImageMap, kontrollen enten genererer en tilbakesending til serveren eller navigerer til en angitt URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction Use the ImageMap control to create an image that contains defined hot spot regions.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#introduction) - [tilgjengelighet](#accessibility) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduksjon Bruk ImageMap-kontrollen vil opprette et bilde som inneholder områder som er definert hot sted.

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks a hot spot region, the control can either generate a postback to the server or navigate to a specified URL.
trans-unit.target: Når en bruker velger et e-område, kan kontrollen generere en tilbakesending til serveren eller gå til en angitt URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this control to display a map of a geographical region.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke kontrollen for å vise et kart for et geografisk område.

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks a specific region on the map, the control navigates to a URL that provides additional data about the selected region.
trans-unit.target: Når en bruker velger et bestemt område på kartet, navigerer kontrollen til en URL-adresse som gir ytterligere data om det valgte området.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this control to generate a postback to the server and run specific code based on the hot spot region that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke kontrollen til å generere en tilbakesending til serveren og kjøre bestemte kode som er basert på e-området som ble klikket.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use an ImageMap control to capture user responses such as votes.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke en kontroll som ImageMap til capture brukersvar som stemmer.

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the hot spot region defined for yes votes, code is called to record a yes response in a database.
trans-unit.target: Når en bruker klikker e-området som er definert for Ja stemmer, kalles kode for å registrere svar Ja i en database.

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks on the hot spot region defined for no votes, a no response is recorded.
trans-unit.target: Når en bruker klikker på e-området som er definert for ingen stemmer, registreres ingen svar.

trans-unit.source: You can also mix these two scenarios within a single ImageMap control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også blande disse to scenarier i én ImageMap kontroll.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify one hot spot region to navigate to a URL and another hot spot region to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan du angi én e-område til å navigere til en URL-adresse og en annen e-område ikke poste på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property to specify the path to the image to display for the ImageMap control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>til å angi banen til bildet som skal vises for kontrollen som ImageMap.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can define any number of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects within an ImageMap control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan definere antall <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekter i en kontroll som ImageMap.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot> classes to define hot spot regions.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot>klasser til å definere e-områder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can derive from the abstract <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> class to define your own custom hot spot object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt være avledet fra abstract <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>klassen for å definere dine egne egendefinerte hot sted-objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to specify the behavior of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an ImageMap control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Det er to måter å angi virkemåten for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekt i en ImageMap kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: You can use either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property on the ImageMap control or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property on an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke begge den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>egenskapen ImageMap kontrollen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>egenskapen for en individuell <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties are set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Disse egenskapene er angitt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode>nummereringsverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property specified on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object takes precedence over the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property on the ImageMap control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis begge egenskapene er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>egenskapen som er angitt i hver enkelt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektet overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>egenskapen kontrollen ImageMap.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To navigate to a URL, set either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil navigere til en URL-adresse, angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A>til å angi URL-adressen til å navigere til.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To generate a postback to the server, set either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `HotSpotMode.Postback`.
trans-unit.target: For å generere en tilbakesending til serveren, angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `HotSpotMode.Postback`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property to specify a name for the hot spot region.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>til å angi et navn for e-område.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This name will be passed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> event data when a postback event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette navnet vil bli sendt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>Hendelsesdata når sende tilbake hendelsen inntreffer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Når en tilbakesending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>klikkes, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Programmatisk styre handlingene utføres når en tilbakesending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>er valgt, angi en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To cause all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects in an ImageMap control to have the same behavior, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Vil føre til at alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekter i en ImageMap kontrollen skal på samme måte bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å angi virkemåten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Then, either set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Angi enten deretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen for hver enkelt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekt `HotSpotMode.NotSet` eller ikke angi en verdi for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify different behaviors for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects in an ImageMap, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to either `HotSpotMode.Navigate` or `HotSpotMode.PostBack`.
trans-unit.target: Angi forskjellige virkemåter for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekter i en ImageMap angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap i hver enkelt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekt enten `HotSpotMode.Navigate` eller `HotSpotMode.PostBack`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an ImageMap control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on any of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects it contains is set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or is not set to a value, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis en ImageMap kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap i noen av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektene i den er satt til `HotSpotMode.NotSet` eller ikke er satt til en verdi som standard virkemåte er `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ## Tilgjengelighet For informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer denne kontrollen, slik at den genererer markup som overholder tilgjengelighet standarder se [tilgjengelighet i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                        ```
trans-unit.target: ## Deklarerende syntaks.```                                        ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: Adds the HTML attributes and styles of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control to be rendered to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: HTML-attributter og stiler for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollen skal gjengis til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName> output stream for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere å sette inn riktig attributtene og stiler til den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>utdata dataflyten for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> objekt i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Klikk denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekt i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To allow a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> to raise the Click event, you must first set either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to `HotSpotMode.Postback`.
trans-unit.target: Tillate en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>vil øke Click-hendelsen, må du først angi enten den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekt `HotSpotMode.Postback`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, provide an event handler for the Click event that contains the code to run when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Programmatisk styre handlingene utføres når en tilbakesending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>er klikket, angi en hendelsesbehandling for Click-hendelsen som inneholder koden til å kjøre når hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control can respond to user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen kan svare på inndata fra brukeren.

trans-unit.source: With the Enabled property, you can enable or disable the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: Med egenskapen aktivert, kan du aktivere eller deaktivere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontroll på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is to respond to user clicks; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen er å svare på brukeren klikker; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default behavior for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> objects of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> objects are clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standard virkemåte for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> objekter av en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollerer når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> objekter er klikket.

trans-unit.source: Use the HotSpotMode property to specify the default click behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects within an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Klikk HotSpotMode-egenskapen til å angi standard virkemåte for bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekter i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: This property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode>nummereringsverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser mulige verdier.

trans-unit.source: |Item|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Inactive`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object does not have any behavior.| |`NotSet`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object uses the behavior set by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control's HotSpotMode property.
trans-unit.target: | Elementet | Beskrivelse | |----------|-----------------| | `Inactive`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>-Objektet ikke har noen virkemåte. | | `NotSet`| Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektet bruker virkemåten angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollens HotSpotMode-egenskap.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control does not define the behavior, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects all navigate to a URL.| |`Navigate`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects navigate to a URL.| |`PostBack`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects generate a postback to the server.| You can specify a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object's behavior using either the HotSpotMode property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollen ikke definerer virkemåten, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekter alle gå til en URL-adresse. | | `Navigate`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>Objektene gå til en URL-adresse. | | `PostBack`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>Objektene generere en tilbakesending til serveren. | Du kan angi en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektets virkemåten med enten HotSpotMode egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for hver enkelt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property specified on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object takes precedence over the HotSpotMode property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis begge egenskapene er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen som er angitt i hver enkelt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektet overstyrer egenskapen HotSpotMode den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the HotSpotMode property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control, note that the `HotSpotMode.NotSet` and `HotSpotMode.Navigate` values have the same behavior: both navigate to a URL.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir HotSpotMode-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollere, Legg merke til at den `HotSpotMode.NotSet` og `HotSpotMode.Navigate` verdier har samme virkemåte: begge gå til en URL-adresse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: When you specify `HotSpotMode.NotSet` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object, that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> determines its behavior from the value of the HotSpotMode property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir `HotSpotMode.NotSet` for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for en individuell <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektet, som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>bestemmer virkemåten fra verdien for egenskapen HotSpotMode for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.Navigate` for the HotSpotMode property, the page navigates to a URL when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir `HotSpotMode.Navigate` for egenskapen HotSpotMode siden navigerer til en URL-adresse når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A>til å angi URL-adressen til å navigere til.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.PostBack` for the HotSpotMode property, the page generates a postback to the server when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir `HotSpotMode.PostBack` for egenskapen HotSpotMode siden genererer en tilbakesending til serveren når det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property to specify the name of the hot spot region.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>til å angi navnet på e-område.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This name will be passed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> event data when a postback event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette navnet vil bli sendt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>Hendelsesdata når sende tilbake hendelsen inntreffer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Når en tilbakesending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>klikkes, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Programmatisk styre handlingene utføres når en tilbakesending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>er valgt, angi en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.Inactive` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object does not have any behavior when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir `HotSpotMode.Inactive` for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektet ikke har noen virkemåte når den klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this value to create an inactive hot spot within a larger active hot spot.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne verdien til å opprette en inaktiv hot sted i et større aktive hot sted.

trans-unit.source: This option is provided to allow you to create more complex hot spot zones within an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet er angitt slik at du kan opprette mer komplekse e-soner i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: To create an inactive area within an active hot spot, you must specify the inactive hot spot before the active hot spot in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en inaktiv område i en aktiv hot sted, må du angi inaktiv hot punktet før det aktive hot stedet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> defines an active ring by specifying an inactive circular hot spot within a larger active circular hot spot: ``` <asp:ImageMap ID="SaturnImage" ImageUrl="~/saturn.PNG" runat="server" OnClick="SaturnImage_Click"> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="planet" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="planet" Radius=40 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot HotSpotMode=Inactive Radius=60 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="rings" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="rings" Radius=80 X=100 Y=100 /> </asp:ImageMap> ``` To cause all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control to have the same behavior, use the HotSpotMode property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control to specify the behavior.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel følgende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>definerer en aktiv ringen ved å angi en inaktiv sirkulære hot sted i et større aktive sirkulære hot sted: ``` <asp:ImageMap ID="SaturnImage" ImageUrl="~/saturn.PNG" runat="server" OnClick="SaturnImage_Click"> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="planet" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="planet" Radius=40 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot HotSpotMode=Inactive Radius=60 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="rings" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="rings" Radius=80 X=100 Y=100 /> </asp:ImageMap> ``` vil føre til at alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekter i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>tilgangskontroll til som har samme virkemåte ved å bruke egenskapen HotSpotMode på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontroll for å angi virkemåten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: Then, either set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Angi enten deretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>egenskapen for hver enkelt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekt `HotSpotMode.NotSet` eller ikke angi en verdi for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify different behaviors for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to either `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, or `HotSpotMode.Inactive`.
trans-unit.target: Angi forskjellige virkemåter for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekter i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollere må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen for hver enkelt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekt enten `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, eller `HotSpotMode.Inactive`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control's HotSpotMode property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on any of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects it contains is either set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or not set to a value, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollens HotSpotMode egenskap eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap i noen av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektene i den er enten satt til `HotSpotMode.NotSet` eller ikke er satt til en verdi som standard virkemåte er `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_NotSet" name="NotSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_NotSet" name="NotSet" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified type is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte typen er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> objects that represents the defined hot spot regions in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> objekter som representerer den definerte hot Fang opp områder i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the HotSpots property to programmatically manage the hot spot regions in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk soner-egenskapen for å programmatisk administrere e-områder i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: You can use the HotSpots property to add, insert, remove, and retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen soner å legge til insert, Fjern og hente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"></xref> object that represents the defined hot spot regions in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"> </xref> objektet som representerer definerte hot sted-områder i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.SaveViewState*> method.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter visningsstatus informasjon for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollen fra en tidligere sideforespørsel som er lagret av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.SaveViewState*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av .NET Framework-infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere kan imidlertid overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil angi hvordan en egendefinert serverkontroll gjenoppretter visningstilstanden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET oversikt over tilstand](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control to restore.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollen til å gjenopprette.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: savedState is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: savedStateer ikke et gyldig .

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click"> </xref> hendelse for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekt i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>

trans-unit.source: To allow a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event, you must first set either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to `HotSpotMode.Postback`.
trans-unit.target: Tillate en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>opphøye den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>hendelsen, må du først angi enten den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objekt `HotSpotMode.Postback`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnClick kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An argument of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Et argument av typen <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control when a form is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer hendelser for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollere når et skjema posteres tilbake til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the RaisePostBackEvent method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Siden sender verdien for den `eventArgument` parameter for RaisePostBackEvent-metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> raises a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>opphøyer et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>hendelse for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektet som ble klikket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Sends the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control content to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object, which writes the content to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: Sender den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollere innholdet for den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> -objektet som skriver innholdet til å gjengi på klienten.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: When developing a custom server control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control, you can override this method to generate content for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>.
trans-unit.target: Når utvikle en egendefinert serverkontroll avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontroll, du kan overstyre denne metoden for å generere innholdet for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that receives the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet som skal motta den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollere innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Saves any changes to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control's view-state that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer endringer i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollens-visningsstatusen som har forekommet siden siden ble posteres tilbake til serveren.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: Visningsstatusen er summen av verdiene i en serverkontroll egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: Disse verdiene plasseres automatisk i server kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>egenskapen som er en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen er deretter beholdt i en strengobjektet når lagringen tilstand fase av server kontrollen levetid.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET oversikt over tilstand](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an `Hidden` HTML element.
trans-unit.target: Når visningsstatusen lagres, strengobjektet returneres til klienten som en variabel som er lagret i en `Hidden` HTML-element.

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's `ViewState` property.
trans-unit.target: Når du skriver egendefinerte serverkontroller, du kan forbedre effektiviteten av overstyrer denne metoden, og endre din serverkontroll `ViewState` egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](../Topic/ASP.NET%20State%20Management%20Overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET oversikt over tilstand](../Topic/ASP.NET%20State%20Management%20Overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollens gjeldende visningsstatus.

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen visningsstatusen som er knyttet til kontrollen metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent*>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to raise an event for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control when a form is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å opprette en hendelse for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollere når et skjema posteres tilbake til serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame that displays the Web page content linked to when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir målvinduet eller rammen som viser nettside-innholdet som er koblet til når de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: Use the Target property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page r when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Target-egenskapen til å angi rammen eller vindu som viser websiden r når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: The Web page is specified by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Websiden er angitt ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Target property is used when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`; it is ignored when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property is `HotSpotMode.PostBack`.
trans-unit.target: Target-egenskap brukes når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>egenskapen `HotSpotMode.Navigate`; ignoreres når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>egenskapen `HotSpotMode.PostBack`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Target property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Target-egenskapen ikke er angitt, nettleser eller vinduet med fokus oppdateres når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Target property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Target-egenskapen blir gjengitt som et `target` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: Den `target` attributtet for `anchor` elementer er ikke tillatt i typedefinisjonen XHTML 1.1 dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Do not set the Target property if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> must be XHTML 1.1-compliant.
trans-unit.target: Ikke angi egenskapen Target hvis den gjengitte utdata for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>må være XHTML 1.1-kompatible.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [XHTML standarder i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > > When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended that you avoid using the Target property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: >> Når du oppretter tilgjengelig nettsider, anbefales det at du unngår å bruke Target-egenskapen til et nytt vindu som mål.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [tilgjengelighet i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame that displays the specified Web page when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Målvinduet eller rammen som viser det angitte webområdet siden når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore:
trans-unit.target: Verdier må begynne med en bokstav i området for A til Z (samlingstype), bortsett fra følgende spesielle verdier som begynner med et understrekingstegn:

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in a new window without frames.
trans-unit.target: Gjengir innholdet i et nytt vindu uten forhandleren.

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.
trans-unit.target: Gjengir innholdet i overordnet umiddelbar rammesett.

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the search pane.
trans-unit.target: Gjengir innholdet i ruten.

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: Gjengir innholdet i rammen med fokus.

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the full window without frames.
trans-unit.target: Gjengir innholdet i hele vinduet uten forhandleren.

trans-unit.source: Check your browser documentation to determine if the <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref> value is supported.
trans-unit.target: Se i dokumentasjonen for nettleseren for å finne ut om den <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""> </xref> verdien støttes.

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref> target value.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 og senere støtter den <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""> </xref> målverdi.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control so they can be stored in the control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Sporer visningsstatus endringer i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> kontrollere slik at de kan lagres i kontrollens <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: This method is called automatically by ASP.NET when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles automatisk av ASP.NET når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>kontrollen er initialisert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>
